description.zh-cn: 河北省人民政府的组成部门，负责管理河北省的科学技术工作。
description.en: A constituent department of the Hebei Provincial People's Government, responsible for managing the province's science and technology affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任河北省科学技术厅厅长、党组书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as the Director and Party Group Secretary of the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任河北省科学技术厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as the Deputy Director of the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任河北省科学技术厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as the Deputy Director of the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任河北省科学技术厅一级巡视员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a First-level Inspector at the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Hebei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 河北省科学技术厅是河北省人民政府的组成部门。
description.en: The Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology is a constituent department of the Hebei Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 龙奋杰担任河北省科学技术厅的厅长和党组书记。
description.en: Long Fenjie serves as the Director and Party Group Secretary of the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 李丛民担任河北省科学技术厅的副厅长。
description.en: Li Congmin serves as the Deputy Director of the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 张永强担任河北省科学技术厅的副厅长。
description.en: Zhang Yongqiang serves as the Deputy Director of the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 郭玉明担任河北省科学技术厅的一级巡视员。
description.en: Guo Yuming serves as a First-level Inspector at the Hebei Provincial Department of Science and Technology.
